'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is an [ability](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireAbilities/) in {{poe2}}.

## Description

{{Description|{{#var:description}}}}

## Effects

{{#var:effects_formatted}}

## Notes

* Bleed damage is 10% of the damage dealt on any hit (Graze, Hit, or Crit), which is then dealt as [Raw](/raw/) damage every 3.0 sec for 60.0 sec.
** The damage is stacked cumulatively, meaning each consecutive hit on the target will increase the amount of bleed damage dealt every 3.0 sec.
** The duration is not stacked however. Each damage stack retains its own duration and is tracked separately. When the duration expires, the initial damage is subtracted from the running total. If it was the last stack, the status effect is removed from the target.
** The duration (not the tick rate / interval) scales with [Intellect](/intellect/), as with all durations.
** The tick rate / interval is reset when damage is added to the stack, causing the cumulative bleed damage to be reapplied immediately.
** The bleed damage (for all stacks together) is dealt at the start of the interval, meaning the bonus damage will be dealt immediately upon hit. Assuming that the duration is 60.0 sec, damage will then be dealt 19 more times after (with some tolerance due to the interval being reset on hit).
* '''''BENEFIT:''''' 10% of damage dealt is re-applied per 3.0 sec for 60.0 sec. Critical damage oddly does not seem to affect the total from this. While it's possible that the damage from this source stacks with itself from consecutive hits to damaged targets, they do not seem to trigger any afflictions.
* '''''PENALTY:''''' +50% Recovery Time after making an attack with your Battle Axe.
